detaileddescription.para:
Create a slider objects
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new slider
copy
pointer to a slider object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created slider

Set a new value on the slider
slider
pointer to a slider object
value
new value
anim
LV_ANIM_ON: set the value with an animation; LV_ANIM_OFF: change the value immediately

Set a new value for the left knob of a slider
slider
pointer to a slider object
left_value
new value
anim
LV_ANIM_ON: set the value with an animation; LV_ANIM_OFF: change the value immediately

Set minimum and the maximum values of a bar
slider
pointer to the slider object
min
minimum value
max
maximum value

Make the slider symmetric to zero. The indicator will grow from zero instead of the minimum position.
slider
pointer to a slider object
en
true: enable disable symmetric behavior; false: disable

Set the animation time of the slider
slider
pointer to a bar object
anim_time
the animation time in milliseconds.

Get the value of the main knob of a slider
slider
pointer to a slider object
the value of the main knob of the slider

Get the value of the left knob of a slider
slider
pointer to a slider object
the value of the left knob of the slider

Get the minimum value of a slider
slider
pointer to a slider object
the minimum value of the slider

Get the maximum value of a slider
slider
pointer to a slider object
the maximum value of the slider

Give the slider is being dragged or not
slider
pointer to a slider object
true: drag in progress false: not dragged

Get the animation time of the slider
slider
pointer to a slider object
the animation time in milliseconds.

Get whether the slider is symmetric or not.
slider
pointer to a bar object
true: symmetric is enabled; false: disable
